abstract: Former professional wrestler Jimmy Snuka, also known as Superfly, is arrested on murder charges in death of his girlfriend Nancy Argentino in Allentown, Pa, in 1983.
lead_paragraph: The former star Jimmy Snuka, known as Superfly, was charged with third-degree murder and involuntary manslaughter in the death of his girlfriend more than three decades ago.

headline.main: Pro Wrestler Charged With Murder in 1983 Death

snippet: The former star Jimmy Snuka, known as Superfly, was charged with third-degree murder and involuntary manslaughter in the death of his girlfriend more than three decades ago.
